sub_title: Empowering Brands to Reach New Heights: A Strategic Marketing & Branding Professional
summary: As a passionate and results-driven marketeer with a proven track record in managing brands, I bring a strategic and creative approach to elevating brand equity and driving growth. With experience in developing and executing marketing plans, building strong relationships with stakeholders, and utilizing data-driven insights, I am confident in my ability to drive brand success. Skilled in digital marketing, event planning, and budget management, I am eager to apply my expertise and continue learning in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

[{'company': {'id': 1370131, 'name': 'Resoul Group of Companies', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEgocCRQJhWjA/company-logo_400_400/0/1630576179631/resoulgroup_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=htxReRkRngplx9YI8xTHP-DQMogLAnBZJa5b_VO2FW0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/resoulgroup/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Resoul Group of Companies', 'description': '• Managing a portfolio of top performing brands (El Greko coffee, Campingaz, BBQ Campingaz) to drive brand equity and increase market share and profits
• Liaising with the Marketing Director for the formulation of Marketing Strategy and the annual Business Plan
• Participating in the planning of all the ATL, Digital & National BTL activities and leading the execution by cooperating with external (advertising agencies, media shops, suppliers) and internal partners (project manager, logistics, sales)
• Developing and communicating CSR initiatives in partnership with NGOs to drive positive social impact
• Proactively monitoring and controlling marketing budgets on a monthly basis, making strategic recommendations to optimize spending and elevate brand equity
• Monitoring and analyzing sales progress and suggesting corrective actions when needed
• Analyzing market trends, consumer insights and competition to identify opportunities for growth
• Leading the digital team to maintain a consistent presence on digital media, aiming to increase consumer engagement and brand loyalty  
• Participating in the development of new products (NPD) and collaborating with internal and external partners in order to carry out all the necessary actions for the introduction of the new products in the market (creation of product codes and EAN codes, development of packaging, sales organizers. instruction manuals, master packs and launch plans)
• Actively involved in the formulation of the product range and preparation of the product catalogue and the wholesale price list', 'title': 'Brand Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1307701, 'name': 'METRO AEBE', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFKI_FEkhuaJw/company-logo_400_400/0/1631335824391?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=tYxH0h5eDC4qos3DrxmvRAwENykcoGJuYZR6E5ODPE8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/metro-aebe-greece/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Athens, Greece', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'METRO AEBE', 'description': "• Supporting the development and implementation of the marketing strategy
